Package com.tome25.utils.logging

Class LogTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.logging.LogTracer
  • public class LogTracer
extends Object
    A utility class to improve logging. Used to trace the System Outputs, and to get custom Loggers logging to the System Output.
    Author:
    ToMe25

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String classNameToSimpleClassName​(String className)
      Converts the class name with package to a simple class name without.
      static Logger getError()
      gets the System Error Logger.
      static Logger getGlobal()
      gets a Logger that logs log levels info and below to System.out, and warning and above to System.err, with the give custom name.
      static Logger getLogger​(String name)
      gets a Logger that logs log levels info and below to System.out, and warning and above to System.err, with the give custom name.
      static Logger getOutput()
      gets the System Output Logger.
      static void traceError​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
      Sets System Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old System Error Stream and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
      static void traceOutput​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
      Sets System Output to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old System Output and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
      static void traceOutputs​(File log)
      Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to the log file.
      static void traceOutputs​(File errorLog, File outputLog)
      Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to their respective file.
      static void traceOutputs​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
      Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
      static void traceOutputs​(String log)
      Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to the log file.
      static void traceOutputs​(String errorLog, String outputLog)
      Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to their respective file.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs​(String log)
        Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to the log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the file to log the System Error Stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs​(String errorLog,
                                String outputLog)
        Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to their respective file.
        Parameters:
        errorLog - the file to log the System Error Stream to.
        outputLog - the file to log the System Output Stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs​(File log)
        Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to the log file.
        Parameters:
        log - the file to log the System Error Stream to.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs​(File errorLog,
                                File outputLog)
        Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and a File Output Stream to their respective file.
        Parameters:
        errorLog - the file to log the System Error Stream to. set to null to disable changing System.err.
        outputLog - the file to log the System Output Stream to. set to null to disable changing System.out.

      • traceOutputs

        public static void traceOutputs​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
        Sets System Output and Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old Stream and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
        Parameters:
        additionalStreams - the Output Streams to add to System.out

      • traceError

        public static void traceError​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
        Sets System Error Stream to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old System Error Stream and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
        Parameters:
        additionalStreams - the Output Streams to add to System.err

      • traceOutput

        public static void traceOutput​(OutputStream... additionalStreams)
        Sets System Output to a TracingMultiPrintStream with the old System Output and the Output Streams from additionalStreams.
        Parameters:
        additionalStreams - the Output Streams to add to System.out
